item.title: White House withdraws nomination for David Weldon to head the CDC
item.description: The White House is withdrawing Dave Weldon's nomination to lead the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

item.title: Trump threatens to hit European Union with 200% tariff on wine, alcohol
item.description: President Trump threatened Thursday to impose a massive tariff on wines and other alcoholic beverages from France and other European nations.
